entity-engine-xml:
This is a larger, business-oriented version of the popular iPhone.

It is recommended for those with advanced business requirements. *** Note: This iPhone requires a special business account signup upon receipt of the item to enable all business features. *** --> Spend more than $500 on your favorite products and get a free CD-R Bundle! Buy $50 of your favorite music (all products in Music [MUSIC-101] or sub-category) get a free copy of TestLicencePlus! Limit 2 per order. Spend more than $150 on your favorite music (all products in Music [MUSIC-101] or sub-category) and get a free copy of TestLicencePlus! Spend more than $1000 in any 12 months on our fabulous products and get a 5% discount.
